nodes.text: A Gand shockprod staff was an electrical stun weapon used by Gand Findsmen. The staff ended in a V-shaped twin prod. The stunning electrical jolt was delivered whenever organic material passed between the prods. The staff had an effective range of ten feet.
The weapon was also useful with its setting turned down. A shove and a mild, painful shock could herd an individual into a desired location with little resistance.
